phrase.item: The weather is cloudy and cold.
I wish I were a mullah, I would put [feelings] in your belly [heart].
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The weather is cloudy.
I wish I could become a mullah, I would put fire in your belly [heart].
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The weather is foggy and cold.
I wish I could become a mullah, I would put [feelings] in your belly [heart]
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The weather is cloudy and cold.
I wish I could turn into a mullah, I would put [feelings] in your belly [heart].
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The bat [food] is for dinner.
I [hope] this is a holy night, I will see you in my dream.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The gate is high.
I liked your height, your height is like [that of] the king's descendants.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The gate is high.
I say you are a good companion, a good companion for the father-in-law.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
Say the gate is high.
Whoever is going to pasture, tell the mother her daughter is sad.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is high.
I call you reed fire, the unfaithful reed fire.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
I have climbed up to the high [place].
When I look down, fall has hit the mountains and everything around.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
Your stirrup is bronze.
If you are not willing, just answer me and say no.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The velvet-sewer is sewing.
I am not going to stay in this village, there is no compassionate and no kind person.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The gate is high.
Your height is good, your good height is like [that of] the king's descendants.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The hill is high.
Don't stay with only a shirt.
Wearing just a shirt might kill you.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The high [place] is [for] viewing.
I call you the flames of a fire.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
I have climbed to the high [place].
When I look down, I realize how far [up] I am.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
I have climbed to the high [place], when I look down, I realize how far [up] I am.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The kettle has a high lid.
I swear to God, I like my dear brother.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The kettle has a high lid.
I swear to God, I like you more than myself.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The kettel has a high lid.
I swear to God, I like my brother more than myself.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
Your feet were bound.
You didn't have patience, the distant road bound you.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The hammer is bronze
It is time for autumn, the daughter became separate from her mother.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
A singer of bilbilik [a type of song].
Don't be a very good singer.
A good singer might lose someone.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The teresken [a shrub] is dry.
I remember the water of my homeland, oh, dear mother my mouth is dry.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
There is fire in the [foothills].
It made all the world black, because of her child.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The amber smells.
I won't smell you, oh brother, there is a strong desire to smell [that].
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The flower garden is ready.
When I go out into the garden for a walk, my dear mother is so far from me.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The flower garden is ready.
When I go to the flower garden for a walk, I have forgotten my sweet brother.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Gimirwor [a name] is aromatic.
Don't come with empty hands, it is a shame [to come] with empty hands.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Small flowers are in the wasteland.
[When] is that happy day is coming, that I can return to my homeland?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
You are wearing a vest.
When [I] look at your short height, your height is as short as [that of] a king's child.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
In front of your door there is a pine tree.
I was very young, the bad house made me old.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
There is a pine tree by your door.
I was very young, thinking of you made me old.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is in front of your house.
This world didn't work for me.
I don't need the day of judgment.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
You have alcohol in your hand, [your] youth is gone, old age has reached you.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
You have boots on your feet.
Where can be my beloved brother? My beloved brother is with Kulob.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Above your house there is ephedra [a shrub], don't talk too loud, youngsters are sleeping.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The world has its own world.
If this world doesn't work [for me], why do I need the day of judgment?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is sewn.
I wish [your] mother were closer, you could express the sorrow in your belly.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Your headband is sewn [hand made].
Anyway you left, before leaving raise your face up for me [look at me].
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A sewn headband.
My eyes [vision] stayed outside, by looking outside [waiting for you] my soul departed [I died].
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A sewn sack.
Anyway you are leaving, hold your head up high.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A sewn sack.
Whoever is going to my dear mother's side, tell the mother her daughter is sad.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A sewn sack.
Whoever is going home, tell the mother her daughter is sad.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Anyway you are leaving at night.
I miss my dear brother.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The river has expanded.
The swimmers came, I wonder what my soldier has ordered?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
[My] heart is ???
Don't make me bad, I am blameless in this strange place.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
[My] heart is wailing.
Don't hold me next to you, I am in this strange village.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is about to leave.
May you be blessed, may you be blessed nine times.
I wail for you like a nightingale.
The necklace is [made of] small strings.
Daughter, stay for a while.
Your mother is wailing for you from her belly.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The moon is in your floor [house].
My age was young, from missing you I have turned into a coal.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The sun is in your floor [house].
Everytime I remember you, from your pain [I] turned into a black coal.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
My dear brother is a soldier.
Your time is almost over, now you ask permission to leave.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Brother do not wail, you are wailing day and night.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The baby [milk] bird is going from birch to birch.
Anytime I remember you, I wail day and night.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The baby [milk] bird ???
I will make you ???, I will tie it to your neck.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The baby [milk] bird ???
On a good day, tell my mother the news about me.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A carrot's seed.
To give the heart was easy, separation is harder than the grave.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A yellow [flower] blooming on her neck.
It was a strange place, being far [from home] is narrower than the grave.
​ ‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A yellow [flower] blooming on her neck.
May the lucky day come, [when] I will hug my beloved brother.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
A yellow blooming [flower] in a wasteland.
Your year [time] is finished, [you are] returning to your father's homeland.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
I am [like] a yellow blooming [flower] in her neck.
When the holy day will come, we are holding hands in father's homeland.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The cup is yellow.
Whoever is going to the city, give my regards to my dear father.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is yellow.
For a good [person] one sings bilbilik, but for bad one nothing.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The textile is yellow.
The soldiers left, my soldier is a traveler.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The cotton is yellowish.
The sun is rising, at sunrise my dear brother will leave.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The cotton is yellowish.
The sun is rising, at sunrise my beloved will leave.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The snow has fallen.
I will make a bracelet for you, your bracelet will have two pearls.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The ??? is colorful.
Don't complain, it is harmful for your belly and teeth.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Giving you my heart was easy, separation is harder than the grave.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Sunset in the wasteland.
A horseman came, a gun on his neck.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
It is afternoon, don't stay in sorrow, keep yourself busy.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
It is afternoon, I am just talking, inside I am hurt.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The sun is under the stone [set], you stayed at night in desert, nobody is aware of your situation.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
It is evening prayer time.
Who can tell news of your arrival?
I come out to greet my son.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The sun is shining above stones, I stayed in the desert, who is aware of my situation?

I stayed in the desert, who is aware of my situation?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.

Lucky little brother, [he] is always after his mother.

The sun is an herb.
Dear father don't be sad, your consoler is sweet God.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The sun is just like gravel.
I stayed in the desert, who is aware of my situation?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The wheat is in stooks.
Don't tell to my dear brother anything, for my dear brother only one seed-grain.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The wheat is in stooks.
The lucky friends, who are sitting face to face.

An iron crook.
The summer is over, for wintertime I have God [to help me].

This [person?] left, your consoler is sweet God.

These people who have daughters came, this situation is unlucky.

The bird is in the steppe.
I will make a metal crook, I look for you to come back.

The bird is in the sky.
This ???, now my heart and my insides are all burning.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The doll is on the pillar, [I miss] my childhood, [I was] after my mother day and night.

Your eyebrows are like pencil.
When I point, you return by the smell of flower.

Your eyebrows are like a pencil.
With a flower I point at you, and you return by the smell of the flower.

Your eyebrows are like pencil.
When I point, you return from the road.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
You pipe is like a pencil.
If I die before all of you, I will be called a person of paradise.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is on the stage.
The army came, including my dear brother.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
If I die before my brother, [I] the sister will be called a person of paradise.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
Your boat is like a pencil.
Dear father if I die before you, [I] the daughter will be called a person of paradise.

Who can tell me the news about my dear brother? I can go out to greet my brother.

Anyway you are leaving.
At least don't forget my name.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is on the side [of the river].
I have lost my energy, without energy [my] face looks sick.

I am just talking, but inside I am hurt.

?? dried yogurt.
Who can bring me the news of my brother, a sister can go out to greet her brother.

‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.

The villagers came, your situation is unlucky.

I am just talking, deep inside I am hurt.

I can find everything, oh, but it is impossible to find [my] parents.

Everything is possible to find,
Oh, but it is impossible to find [my] parents.

Everything was possible to find, only it was impossible to find [my] parents.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The sparrow is going from birch to birch.
Don't wail too much, you are wailing day and night.

The king's orchard is ready.
When I go out for a walk in the orchard, the mountains and everything around is yellow.

The moon is hot.
All the stones and wood melted, good job to my young age.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
??? is to his/her face.
All my energy is gone, [my] face is pale.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The flock goes to the field.
I wish you would turn into sugar, I will put you in my mouth.

The flocks are on the other side.
Lucky those shepherds, the shepherds look healthy.

A car is on the road.
Where your journey will go, your journey is toward the Pamir roads.

The amil beads.
Anyway you died, who will take care of your orphans?
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The amil beads.
Dear father, anyway you left, sweet God will take care of you.

Whoever is going to my son's place, tell him your mother is a shepherd.
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.

I swear to God, I love you more than my soul [myself].
‎‎I wail for you like a nightingale.
The beads are one and two.
Whenever I say dear mother, there are seven rains [tears] on my face.

Childhood was the happiest time, childhood is like a wave.

The sadaf [bead] is on your heel.
Dear father I looked at you, and I forgot your height.

Why do I need your kerchief? I dream of meeting you.
